title: Technology and National Security Fellowship
description: The Technology and National Security Fellowship is a paid opportunity for technologists and entrepreneurs to serve their country by embedding with key decision makers at the top levels of the U.S. Government. Up to 15 fellows with STEM backgrounds and technical expertise will be selected for a 1-year cohort, August 2021 to August 2022, in the Washington, D.C. area, either at Capitol Hill or the Pentagon. Fellows will provide policy makers and their immediate staff with technical expertise and advice on a variety of critical subject areas. [Apply by April 15](https://airtable.com/shrYcWlpvzO1C2nct).
